snippet.title: DEAD BY DAYLIGHT MOBILE: Coming soon this 2020
snippet.description:
Your favorite deadly game of cat and mouse will soon be playable in a fully optimized mobile version. 

Dead by Daylight Mobile is an asymmetrical 4 vs 1 multiplayer horror survival game which pits one ruthless Killer against four Survivors, as they try to evade a gruesome death. Play with your friends online and take on the role of either Killer or Survivor in this deadly game of hide and seek. Discover cult classic characters in your next action-packed Trial. Dead by Daylight is available on PC, console and is now free on mobile. Play the game on Android and iOS to earn exclusive rewards, partake in new events, and enjoy regular content updates. 

Dead by Daylight Mobile is available in EMEA, The Americas, and South Asia!
Download now: https://bit.ly/2TDZIkR 

Follow us: 
Twitter - https://twitter.com/dbdmobile 
Facebook - https://facebook.com/dbdmobileofficial 
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/dbdmobile/
